affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, "无…的, 不…的"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）

word_group.brief_definition: 无用的生活；无用的生命

bilingual.target: 他把那些无用的文件报废了。

bilingual.source: Trying to fix this broken chair is useless.
bilingual.target: 试图修理这把坏掉的椅子是无用的。

bilingual.source: We should stop wasting time on useless things.
bilingual.target: 我们应该停止浪费时间在无用的事情上。

bilingual.source: It's useless to argue with him when he's angry.
bilingual.target: 当他生气时和他争论是无用的。

bilingual.source: Without the right tools, this manual is useless.
bilingual.target: 没有合适的工具，这本手册是无用的。

bilingual.source: And she has come to realize that she is not useless.
bilingual.target: 她已经意识到她并不是无用的。

bilingual.source: But life that depends on things thought to be useless, life even without DNA.
bilingual.target: 但生命依赖于被认为是无用的东西，甚至是没有DNA的生命。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for nothing, you useless reptile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真是帮倒忙，没用的家伙。

yingyinNormal.en: Broken. Useless. Likely to cause thermonuclear fission.
yingyinNormal.zh: 坏的，没用，可能会导致热核裂变。

yingyinNormal.en: I will not. Parties are useless and take up valuable Boov time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不去，派对毫无益处，还浪费宝贵的波波时间。

yingyinNormal.en: It only moves in time. It would be worse than useless in a swamp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个只能在时间上移动，这个在沼泽地里会比无用更无用。

yingyinNormal.en: God knows I don't need the rest of him. Look at him, he's useless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他部位不用了，瞧他那逊样。

yingyinNormal.en: He wanted to exploit my savagery. Intellect alone is useless in a fight, Mr. Spock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他想要利用我的野性，在一场战役中单用智慧是没用的史波克先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Turns out that funny smell was rat poison. Suddenly, Dad didn't think my talent was useless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后证实那个怪味是老鼠药，老爸突然觉得我的天分也不是没有丝毫用处。

yingyinNormal.en: I ask for a replacement for O'Reilly and this is what I get? A useless, skinny, untrained snot!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我请求调个人来替代奥莱利，怎么来了你这么个人，一个没用的瘦巴巴的菜鸟废物。

yingyinNormal.en: How long have you been dead son? Sir? I am not Sir. I am Sergeant Howell or Sarge. Sir you say for useless people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你死多久了？孩子。长官。我不是长官。我是豪厄尔中士或军士。“长官”是叫没用的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Like I tried to tell you in the interview, Ross, this grant is not based on your knowledge of pretty useless trivia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就如之前的面试我告诉你的一样，这个补助基金不是为了这些无聊的知识而设的。

yingyinNormal.en: Buster Moon. We met at Eddie's graduation. Oh, lucky me. A visit from my useless grandson and his ghastly little theater friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是月伯乐，埃迪的朋友，我们在毕业典礼上见过。哦，真是好运，原来是我那没用的孙子和他开剧院的奇怪小朋友上门了。

yingyinNormal.en: You are useless. Freaking out about commitment is the one thing you can do. The one thing. And you can't even do that right. God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真没用，害怕承诺是你唯一会做的事，你竟然连那件事都做不好！天啊。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't want to win another giant Teddy, Peppa. Sound worry. You won't win. Women are useless at this. I'm sorry. What did you say? It's a game of skill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，我们已经有一只大熊猫了。不用担心，你不会赢的，女生不适合擅长这个。抱歉，你说什么？这游戏需要技巧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: being of or having no use

examination_example.sentence: It's not that measures such as London's Ulez are <highlight>useless</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并不是说伦敦的Ulez等措施没有用。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: Our erroneous belief that countries are cultures has caused businesses to teach their employees <highlight>useless</highlight> ways of interacting with their international peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们错误地认为国家是一种文化，这导致企业向员工传授与国际同行交流的无用方法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And she has come to realize that she is not <highlight>useless</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她已经意识到她并不是无用的。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>useless</highlight> to regret what has been done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后悔所做的事是没有用的。

examination_example.sentence: It’s <highlight>useless</highlight> to only have a fishing rod, fishing skills are more important than having a fishing rod.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有鱼竿是没用的，钓鱼技巧比有鱼竿更重要。
